sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Upgrade Script-Aug22 (sdc Dictionary)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var choiceArr = [{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^value=20',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'In Review'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^value=30',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Work in Progress'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^value=70',
        'attribute': {
            'sequence': '15'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line^value=work_in_progress',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Work in Progress'
        }
    }
];

// Update Choices in Dictionary
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);

function updateChoice(obj) {
    var choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    choiceGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    choiceGr.query();
    while (choiceGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(choiceGr, obj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-05-16 06:38:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0bbd2074c3630110c37ea9e58640ddae</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Upgrade Script-Aug22 (sdc Dictionary)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">d8a34403534f101077b6ddeeff7b12a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">d8a34403534f101077b6ddeeff7b12a5</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0bbd2074c3630110c37ea9e58640ddae</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-06-16 09:12:29</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
